cards.name: Protection
cards.description: Give 9 Block to a random (selected) ally.

cards.name: Provoke
cards.description: Gain 12 block. Apply 2 tiscardpack:Taunt.

cards.name: Quick Jabs
cards.description: Deal 2 damage 2 (3) times to all enemies. Apply 1 taunt per hit. Gain 3 Block per each enemy hit.

cards.name: Swift Blow
cards.description: Deal 6 (8) Damage. If played by a class other than an Ironclad, also apply 2 (3) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Offensive Tactics
cards.description: Remove Block from ALL players. Deal damage equal to 2 (3) times the Block removed.

cards.name: Rally
cards.description: Give ALL allies 1 (2) Strength.

cards.name: Reinforce
cards.description: Apply 5 tiscardpack:Taunt. ALL allies lose their Block. Gain Block equal to that amount.

cards.name: Relay Baton
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Each time this card is traded, gain 10 (15) damage.

cards.name: Shield
cards.description: Give ALL allies 6 (10) Block.

cards.name: Blood Pact
cards.description: Whenever you lose HP, heal all allies by 1 HP.

cards.name: Controlled Flame
cards.description: ALL allies tiscardpack:Transfer up to 3 (5) chosen cards from their hand, and receive a random card for each card they tiscardpack:Transferred. The cards are Exhausted upon tiscardpack:Transferring.

cards.name: Extending Grasp
cards.description: Select 1 card from ANY ally Exhaust pile. tiscardpack:Transfer it to your Hand. tiscardpack:Transfer this card to the player and Exhaust it.

cards.name: Strength from Pain
cards.description: Lose 3 (5) HP. ALL allies gain Strength equal to HP lost. Exhaust.

cards.name: Boomerang
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Increase this card's damage for 3 (5) this turn and tiscardpack:Transfer it to a random player.

cards.name: Caustic Dagger
cards.description: Deal 6 (8) Damage. If played by a class other than The Silent, also apply 10 (15) Poison.

cards.name: Golden Shiv
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. 15% chance to Exhaust. Otherwise, increase the chance to Exhaust by 10 (5)% and tiscardpack:Transfer it to a random Ally.

cards.name: Quick Draw
cards.description: ALL allies draw a card.

cards.name: Antidote
cards.description: Remove ALL Poison from ALL allies and heal them for the same amount.  (Retain.) Exhaust.

cards.name: Bombard
cards.description: ALL allies discard their hand. Allies deal 1 (2) damage for each card discarded.

cards.name: Copycat
cards.description: Copy the next  (2) ally played card (cards). Exhaust.

cards.name: Evasive Dust
cards.description: Give ALL allies 3 (5) Dexterity for this turn.

cards.name: Group Plans
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, ALL allies gain [G]  ([G]) and draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Neurotoxin
cards.description: Give EVERYONE block equal to the divided amount of enemy poison.

cards.name: Select Draw
cards.description: (Innate.) Whenever an ally manually discards a card, draw a card.

cards.name: Splash Potion
cards.description: Apply 20 (35) Poison to ALL enemies and 3 Poison to ALL allies and yourself.

cards.name: Scrapper
cards.description: Whenever an ally manually discards a card, gain 1 Shiv. (+.)

cards.name: Prototype Experiment
cards.description: Deal 6 (8) Damage. If played by a class other than a Defect, gain 1 (2) Focus and channel a random Orb.

cards.name: Clawed
cards.description: Each ally played Claw counts towards your Claw damage as well. (Add 3 Claws randomly to your ally draw piles.)

cards.name: Core Duplicate
cards.description: Select any Ally power card and add a  (0-cost) copy of it to your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Drain Systems
cards.description: All allies lose 1 [E]. Channel Lightning equal to 2 (3) times the consumed [E] .

cards.name: Faulty Sensors
cards.description: Reduce the Strength of ALL enemies by 2 (3) and ALL allies by 1. Exhaust

cards.name: Power Source
cards.description: Give all players 1 (2) energy.

cards.name: Repair Mechanism
cards.description: At end of combat, ALL allies heal 2 (3) HP.

cards.name: Spare Battery
cards.description: tiscardpack:Construct 1 (2) Plasma at the selected ally.

cards.name: Time Bomb
cards.description: tiscardpack:Construct 1 Dark Orb at the selected ally. Place a Detonate in a teammate's discard pile. Exhaust.

cards.name: Cryogenics
cards.description: Frost orbs now also apply block to all teammates. Channel 2 (3) Frost.

cards.name: Purify
cards.description: Convert ALL current and future Dark orbs into Purified Dark orbs.

cards.name: Replicate
cards.description: Next skill (2)  (skills) you play this turn will play for each ally in the room as well.

cards.name: Stasis
cards.description: ALL allies can't take damage or play cards this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Broken Stature
cards.description: Add Weak Point  (+) to the draw pile of ALL allies.

cards.name: Conviction
cards.description: Deal 6 (8) Damage. If played by a class other than the Watcher, gain 3 (8) Mantra.

cards.name: Recite
cards.description: Gain 2 (4) Mantra. ALL allies gain 1 tiscardpack:Insanity.

cards.name: Act of Creation
cards.description: Make ALL allies go into Calm.

cards.name: Act of Destruction
cards.description: Make ALL allies go into Wrath.

cards.name: Clairvoyance
cards.description: ALL allies Scry 3 (5).

cards.name: Mania
cards.description: Whenever an ally takes unblocked damage, they gain 1 Strength and 1 tiscardpack:Insanity.

cards.name: Sacred Ground
cards.description: Whenever an ally gains tiscardpack:Insanity, gain 1 [E].

cards.name: Sanctify
cards.description: Whenever you gain Mantra, ALL allies gain 1 Mantra. Does not stack.

cards.name: Blind Faith
cards.description: Put ALL allies into Divinity until the end of the turn. Put a Broken Faith in ALL allies hand (draw pile). Exhaust.

cards.name: Cleanse
cards.description: Remove tiscardpack:Insanity from ALL allies and gain Mantra equal to the removed amount. Give ALL allies 1 Artifact if you enter Divinity.~~-  Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Divine Resurrection
cards.description: Revive ALL dead allies in the room to 1 HP. Apply tiscardpack:Doomed (,) ~~- and  -~~ tiscardpack:Spirit_Bind (,)  (and Buffer) to them.

cards.name: Mass Hysteria
cards.description: ALL Allies enter Wrath, gain 10 tiscardpack:Insanity, discard ALL their non Attack cards (, and gain 2 [E]).

cards.name: Detonate
cards.description: Evoke all your Dark orbs. Exhaust.

cards.name: Full Charge
cards.description: Gain tiscardpack:Full_Charge. Exhaust.

cards.name: Weak Point
cards.description: Apply 1 (2) Mark (Marks) to an enemy. ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

cards.name: Blank Card
cards.description: Obtain a copy of a random highest rarity card from the deck of ALL your allies (and upgrade it). Play it and Exhaust it after. Exhaust.

cards.name: Group Charge
cards.description: (Innate.) Shuffle 1 Full Charge into the draw pile of all players in the room. Exhaust.

cards.name: Broken Faith
cards.description: Whenever you play a card with this card in hand gain 1 tiscardpack:Insanity. Unplayable.

cards.name: Distrust
cards.description: Whenever you draw this card a random ally gains 1 Frail and 1 Weak. Unplayable.

cards.name: Hot Potato
cards.description: When Discarded, permanently tiscardpack:Transfer this card to a random player. If you end the combat with this curse in your deck lose 5 HP. Unplayable.

cards.name: Infection
cards.description: Whenever you draw this card, put a copy of it in a random player's discard pile. Unplayable.

cards.name: Touch of the Spire
cards.description: Whenever you draw this card gain 1 tiscardpack:Insanity. Unplayable.

cards.name: Demon's Temptation
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage. If played by a class other than The Unchained, gain 6 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and add a random 2-cost card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn and exhausts.

cards.name: Demonic Siphon
cards.description: Gain 6 (8) theunchainedmod:Relay for each teammate. All teammates gain 8 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: Protector Glyph
cards.description: One random teammate gains 10 (13) theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Soften Target
cards.description:
Deal 3 (5) damage.
The first time this target is attacked by a teammate, apply 3 (4) theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor.

cards.name: Arcane Reversal
cards.description: When teammates would usually gain theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage, they instead now deal this damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Chaos Chains
cards.description: (Innate.) All players gain a unchainedpack:Helper_Chain at the start of their turns.

cards.name: Glyph Bauble
cards.description: Retain. Play  (this card) on a teammate to tiscardpack:Transfer  (it) to them (that)  (teammate) with a 20% chance to Exhaust. Increase (If)  (it doesn't, increase) the chance to Exhaust by 10 (5)% and double this cards (card's) theunchainedmod:Relay. Play  (it) on an enemy to gain 4 theunchainedmod:Relay. Exhaust.

cards.name: Nimble Feet
cards.description: All players deal 3 (4) extra damage with 0-cost cards.

cards.name: Royal Influence
cards.description:
Choose a card from your hand and exhaust it.
All players gain 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Play the card you exhausted.
This chain's type is of the card that was exhausted. Exhaust.

cards.name: Spaghetti Arms
cards.description: A (Select) random (a) teammate (.)  (They) no longer deals (deal) damage with their attacks this turn and instead, the enemy gains Block equal to the damage they would do. Exhaust.

cards.name: Sympathy Link
cards.description: Select a teammate from whose pool to draft a (an)  (upgraded) 2-cost card. Add that card to your and your teammates hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Tango Strike
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 8 damage.
Gain 1 (2) theunchainedmod:Momentum.
Add a Tango Strike (+) into a random teammate's hand. It exhausts.

cards.name: Trade Council
cards.description: All players gain 1 Trade Offer. (+.) Exhaust.

cards.name: Crush Force
cards.description:
All players gain 2 Strength.
Every time each player attacks, apply 1 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor.

cards.name: Tethered Heart
cards.description: Select a teammate. This teammate will gain 25 (50)% of your theunchainedmod:Relay this combat. Exhaust.

relics.name: Ascender's Rage
relics.description: Every time you're resurrected, lose 10 MAX HP and permanently gain 3 Strength, 3 Dexterity, and 3 Focus.

relics.name: Black Pearl
relics.description: Upon reviving an ally, heal 10 HP and gain 50 gold.

relics.name: Chalice Of Life
relics.description: Revival is now a free action at Rest sites. When reviving an ally, heal them an additional 50% of their max HP.

relics.name: Friendship Bracelet
relics.description: Finishing a Chain with positive effects also applies them to a random teammate.

relics.name: Mutual Respect
relics.description: At the start of each combat gain 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 1 Focus for every connected ally that has this relic.
relics.flavorText: Is that a Gunfire Reborn reference???

relics.name: Mystery Gift
relics.description: Upon Trading, this becomes a random Rare relic.

relics.name: Parasitic Growth
relics.description: On death apply 3 Vulnerable and 3 Weak to all monsters, and deal damage equal to your max HP.

relics.name: Shot Glasses
relics.description: Whenever you use a potion, a random ally in the room uses it as well.

relics.name: Skillbook
relics.description: Whenever you play a card that is not of your player class, gain 2 Block.

relics.name: Alembic
relics.description: If all allies end their turn with 0 energy, gain 1 energy at the start of your next turn.

relics.name: Backup Battery
relics.description: First time you lose [E] because of your allies each turn, gain [E] .

relics.name: Masochism Idol
relics.description: If your teammates would take unblocked damage, you will absorb any damage instead, as long as you have excess Relay.

relics.name: Paperwork
relics.description: You can now trade 2 times per rest site.

relics.name: Runic Egg
relics.description: Whenever you receive a card through trading, upgrade it.

relics.name: Scales of Fate
relics.description: Increase all buffs and decrease all debuffs received from allies by 1.

relics.name: Steampunk Thruster
relics.description: Gain 1 Momentum at the start of combat for each teammate.
relics.flavorText: A contraption ahead of its time. It practically begs to be taken on a joyride.

relics.name: Wide Shield
relics.description: If Taunting an enemy, reduces the Taunt damage multiplier by half.

relics.name: Blood-Bound Red Ring
relics.description: If you're about to take lethal damage, forward it to the highest HP ally in the room that would survive it if they exist.

relics.name: Energy-Draining Yellow Ring
relics.description: X cost cards now use up to 1 Energy from other players in the room.

relics.name: Gold Certificate
relics.description: Global. At the end of each combat add 75 Gold to your rewards. This amount is reduced whenever you or your allies lose HP by the amount of HP lost.

relics.name: Gold-Plated Silver Ring
relics.description: Whenever an ally gains gold, store 10 gold in this relic. On right-click gain ALL gold stored and use up this relic.

relics.name: Protective Rune
relics.description: Insanity effect's chance is decreased from 3% to 1% per stack. Can only spawn if there's an ally Watcher present.

relics.name: Red Speaker
relics.description: Once per combat, typing 'Look at me' in the chat will Taunt ALL enemies for one turn.
relics.flavorText: Might not be a good choice.

relics.name: Sympathetic Shard
relics.description: Whenever Crushed Armor is applied, all your teammates gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: Youâ€™re not sure how it works, but the more battered your foes become, the stronger your party feels.

relics.name: Undead Branch
relics.description: The first ally exhausted card every turn is added to your hand and costs 0. Does not apply to Curse or Status cards.

relics.name: Watermelon
relics.description: Global. Gain 10 Max HP on pickup.
relics.flavorText: Grown in the cracks of the Spire

relics.name: Defective Power Core
relics.description: Whenever you enter a room, apply 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity to all allies.

relics.name: Golden Flame
relics.description: When a monster is spawned, apply tiscardpack:Golden_Flame to them.

relics.name: Magical Thorns
relics.description: Gain 1 [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer trade at rest sites.

relics.name: Phased Burning Blood
relics.description: Global.Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 3 HP.

relics.name: Phased Cracked Core
relics.description: Global. Replaces Cracked Core. Channel 1 Dark at the start of each combat.

relics.name: Phased Pure Water
relics.description: Global. Replaces Pure Water. Add 1 Miracle to your hand on the second turn of every combat.

relics.name: Phased Ring of the Snake
relics.description: Global. Replaces Ring of the Snake. Every second turn draw an extra card.
relics.flavorText: The ring for all those worthy.

relics.name: Inscribed Mirror
relics.description: Upon pickup, select and obtain a copy of any ally's card.
relics.flavorText: Now would you look at that?

relics.name: Klein Bottle
relics.description: Whenever 40 cards are played by allies, deal 20 damage to all enemies.

relics.name: Medical Chip
relics.description: At the end of your turn, remove ALL your remaining [E] and heal a random ally for the amount of [E] removed.

relics.name: Party Bag
relics.description: When you pick up this relic, give all your teammates 1 random shop relic.

relics.name: Scout's Badge
relics.description: If you're the first person to enter a combat, apply 2 weak to all enemies.

potions.name: Singularity Potion
potions.description: Apply 3 Crushed Armor for each teammate.

potions.name: Chain Hex
potions.description: Finish all teammates' chains and apply 1 Skill Chain: gain 6 Block.

keywords.name: Full Charge
keywords.description: If all players have Full Charge power, do 10 damage per player at the end of turn and remove the power.

keywords.name: Golden Flame
keywords.description: Whenever you deal damage with a card to a monster with this power, gain 1 gold.

keywords.name: Spirit Bind
keywords.description: If the player you're bound to dies, die.

keywords.name: Tiscardpack:construct
keywords.description: If the target has no orb slots when channeling, gain an orb slot.

keywords.name: Tiscardpack:doomed
keywords.description: Die at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Tiscardpack:global
keywords.description: Whenever you collect this item, give a copy to each player currently in the game.

keywords.name: Tiscardpack:insanity
keywords.description: Each stack of insanity gives you 3% chance to damage a random ally instead of the intended target. Decreases by 1 at the end of each turn.

keywords.name: Tiscardpack:taunt
keywords.description: Taunted monsters do 10% less damage to other players but 10% more damage to the player that taunted them, per stack of Taunt applied.

keywords.name: Tiscardpack:trade
keywords.description: Permanently moves this item to the given player.

keywords.name: Tiscardpack:transfer
keywords.description: Moves this item to the given player until the end of combat.

keywords.name: Helper Chain
keywords.description: Skill Chain with the length of 1, with the effect of either draw 1 Card, gain 6 Block, gain 5 Vigor, gain 1 Energy or gain 8 Relay.

mods.name: TiS - Official Booster Pack
mods.description: The official content pack for Together in Spire.
